participant_1.background:
I'm trying to get my mother to love me.
i get sad a lot.
I caught a huge fish on my last fishing trip!
I like to get Chick-fil-A on my way to work.
I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.

participant_2.background:
I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
I love kids and dogs, but I could never be a teacher if I were blind.
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
I enjoy reading books to distract myself from pain.
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.

content.text: Hey there! How is your day going?
Great! I am heading home after a long run. I can't wait to eat some tacos and see my girlfriend.
Sounds fun! I just got home from a long day at work. I need to go grocery shopping later and get some food for dinner.
What do you do for work?
I am a teacher. I teach kids how to read and write.
That sounds like a really rewarding job. I could never be a teacher because I am afraid of kids.
Why are you afraid of kids?
I don't know. I just get nervous around them.
That's okay. Not everyone is good with kids. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, exercise, and spend time with my girlfriend.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies.
Yeah, I like to keep busy.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a good rest of your day!
